title: QFD Systematic Parameter Constraint Framework
objective: Transform QFD theory into precision measurement instrument

phase1.description: Constrain cosmological parameters using time-averaged data
phase1.method: MCMC sampling with deactivated plasma veil

phase2.description: Constrain plasma parameters using individual light curves
phase2.data_source: Raw supernova light curve time series

scientific_impact: First systematic constraints on all QFD physical parameters
Quantitative validation of plasma veil mechanism
Data-driven bounds on alternative cosmology theory
Template for multi-observable modified gravity testing

current_status.measurement_precision: Limited by MCMC sampling and light curve quality
